Harapan Sri Mulyani Soal Pendidikan RI Digantungkan di Pundak Nadiem
04 Nov 2019, 05:28 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: (Andhika Prasetia/detikcom).

Jakarta - Nadiem Makarim saat ini menjadi menteri termuda dalam kabinet baru Presiden Jokowi dan Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin. Bahkan Nadiem, dengan usia 35 tahun bisa jadi menteri termuda sepanjang sejarah Indonesia berdiri.Peranan Nadiem sebagai Menteri Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan sendiri menjadi sentral. Pasalnya, pendidikan mendapat alokasi sebesar 20% dari APBN Indonesia.Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati berharap kehadiran Nadiem bisa terus meningkatkan kualitas pendidikan Indonesia. Baik dari sisi programnya, kebijakannya, pelaksanaan anggarannya, dan evaluasinya."Pendidikan penting kita bicara ke depan bagaimana Indonesia menghadapi era globalisasi, era perubahan teknologi, era keterbukaan dan semua ini butuh kesiapan anak-anak didik kita," kata Sri Mulyani saat ditemui di SDN 01 Kenari, Senen, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).Dia berharap, pengelolaan pendidikan yang baik dapat menciptakan sumber daya manusia (SDM) yang unggul dan maju seperti yang dicita-citakan oleh Presiden Jokowi."Peranan dari pendidikan sangat kunci. Kami dari Kemenkeu akan mendukung berbagai upaya di bidang pendidikan dan SDM secara umum," kata Sri Mulyani."Kita dorong supaya bersama-sama satu kabinet kita bekerja sama memajukan Indonesia," tambahnya. Sri Mulyani's Hopes About RI's Education Hang on Nadiem's Shoulders
Nov 04 2019, 05:28 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: (Andhika Prasetia / detikcom).

Jakarta - Nadiem Makarim is currently the youngest minister in President Jokowi's new cabinet and Vice President Ma'ruf Amin. Even Nadiem, with the age of 35 could be the youngest minister in Indonesian history. Nadiem's role as Minister of Education and Culture itself is central. The reason is that education has received an allocation of 20% from the Indonesian State Budget. Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati hopes that Nadiem's presence will continue to improve the quality of Indonesian education. Both in terms of the program, its policies, the implementation of its budget, and its evaluation. "Education is important we talk going forward how Indonesia faces the era of globalization, the era of technological change, the era of openness and all this requires the readiness of our students," Sri Mulyani said when met at SDN 01 Kenari, Senen, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). He hopes that good management of education can create superior and advanced human resources (HR) as aspired by President Jokowi. "The role of education "We are very key. We from the Ministry of Finance will support various efforts in the field of education and human resources in general," said Sri Mulyani. "We encourage that together with one cabinet we work together to advance Indonesia," he added.
